result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. KYLE JAMES BREY

records.addlTxt:
21CF367: Preliminary Hearing waived
Information to be filed. 
Defendant informed of charges and penalties. 
Defendant Advised of Constitutional Rights. 
Acknowledges prior conviction(s). 
21CF367 - Cts. 1 (meth) & 3(RCS): Defendant enters no contest plea. 
Factual basis and probable cause found. 
Court accepts pleas as voluntarily, knowingly and intelligently made and finds defendant guilty. 
Court orders:
 
Ct. 1: 
S/W - 3 years probation
Absolute sobriety
No intoxicants
No drink/drugs/Rx/bars/para/shot/noact
Any counseling
$518

Ct. 3:
S/w - 1 year probation (4 days credit if revoked)
45 days jail - stayed for 18 months pending completion of community service
$1,744 + $36.40
24 month DL revocation
AODA & DSP
12 months IID - 1/2 price approved
75 hours community service to be completed within 18 months.


22CF117 & 22CF120 DRI

11:19 AM Prosecuting attorney Roy La Barton Gay in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant KYLE JAMES BREY appeared by video, in custody in Pierce County.  Attorney Kirby Daniel Harless in court for KYLE JAMES BREY. 
21CF367, 22CF117 & 22CF120
Defendant waives personal appearance.
